title: New: Spoek Mathambo – Control
body:
![](http://cdn.imposemagazine.com/__data/spoek-mathambos-sick-sounds-from-soweto.jpg "spoek")

The fourth single taken from the highly anticipated debut album from **S****poek Mathambo’s** has just been premiered on the **Dazed and Confused** website. _‘Control’_ is a dark and futuristic take on the Joy Division classic, gathering house and dubstep influences, combining them into something genuinely fresh. The video that accompanies the tune will no doubt steal the show however. Shot and directed by South African filmmakers **Pieter Hugo & Michael Cleary**, the short film explores gangs, cults and racism in a brutally disturbing and evocative way. Check it out bellow.
